attributes.action: Listen to the U.K European logistics industry to stop the current carnage.
attributes.additional_details: UK traders are experiencing many problems trying to get their goods to and from the EU. There are I.T and infrastructure problems, lack of customs agents, delays with the issuing of CCGs, severe lack of companies offering T1 customs services and a huge fall in the number of EU drivers coming to the UK causing prices to increase sharply. The EU customers we send our goods to are already loosing faith in their UK suppliers' ability to deliver goods to them in a timely and cost-effective manner.
attributes.background: We want the Government to consult with European logistics companies who are experiencing the problems first hand. They can help the Government to see where the real issues are and be part of the solution. We have the answers, the Government just need to listen to us.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about current arrangements for the movement of goods, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like the Government to make to current arrangements for the movement of goods.
